title: Your Favorite Cars Of 2014 And Beyond -- AFTER/DRIVE
description:
We asked you which cars you were excited to see in 2014, and you told us. Here's your top 10 list, plus a preview of the cars you'll see for the first time at the Detroit Auto Show next week. With Jason Harper, Bloomberg News; Automobile magazine; and Zac Moseley, Classic Car Club Manhattan.

Jason Harper
"Horsepower, Too Much?"
http://www.automobilemag.com/features/magazine/1312_2014_porsche_911_turbo/

2014 Chevrolet Corvette Stingray vs. 2014 SRT Viper GTS
http://www.automobilemag.com/features/news/feature-flick-2014-chevrolet-corvette-stingray-vs-2014-srt-viper-gts-258517

http://www.jasonhharper.com/

Zac Moseley
www.classiccarclubmanhattan.com
